content.value:
We have 6 rooms each with its own private bathroom for the convenience of our customers

Situated in Cali and with Pan-American Park reachable within 1.2 km, Casabiche Hostal features a tour desk, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is set 3.5 km from Saint's Peter Cathedral, 3.5 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and 3.6 km from La Ermita Church. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.
At the guest house, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.
Guests at Casabiche Hostal can enjoy an American breakfast.
Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Casabiche Hostal include Jorge Garcés Borrero Library, The Dog's Park and Artisan Park Loma de la Cruz. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 24 km from the guest house.

description.description: Our house has a very familiar atmosphere which characterizes us and makes us unique. We are located in the San Fernando neighborhood, very close to the sports complexes of the city (Pascual Guerrero soccer stadium, Alberto Galindo swimming pools and Pan-American courts), one block away from the departmental library.
